```{r setup, include=FALSE}

library(data.table)
library(ggplot2)

# read final data
dt <- fread('../../gen/analysis/temp/preclean.csv')
st <- fread('../../gen/analysis/temp/state-analysis.csv')
bt <- fread('../../gen/analysis/temp/BRstate-analysis.csv')
```

### Summary statistics

summary(st)

```


### Plots

```{r fig.width=10 fig.height = 15 }
# tweet count in different states
# B: Blue state | R: Red state | T: Tossup state
ggplot(data=st, mapping=aes(x=reorder(state, tweet_cnt),y = tweet_cnt, fill=BR))+geom_bar(stat='identity')+coord_flip()+geom_text(stat='identity',aes(label=tweet_cnt), vjust=1.6, color="Black", size=4.5)+scale_fill_manual(values=c("B"="blue", "R"="Red", "T"="orange"))+ggtitle('Number of tweet count in different state')+labs(x = NULL,y = 'Number of tweets')
```{r}

```{r fig.width=10 fig.height = 15}
# tweet average polarity in different states
# B: Blue state | R: Red state | T: Tossup state
ggplot(data=st, mapping=aes(x=reorder(state,avg_polarity), y=avg_polarity, fill=BR))+geom_bar(stat='identity')+coord_flip()+geom_text(stat='identity',aes(label=avg_polarity), vjust=1.6, color="Black", size=4.5)+scale_fill_manual(values=c("B"="blue", "R"="Red", "T"="orange"))+ggtitle('Mean polarity of tweet in different state')+labs(x = NULL,y = 'Mean polarity of tweets')
```{r}

```{r}
# Share of B/R/T states
# B: Blue state | R: Red state | T: Tossup state
p <- ggplot(data = bt, mapping = aes(x = 1, y = state_count, fill = state ))
p + geom_col() +
  coord_polar(theta = "y") +
  scale_x_continuous(name = NULL, breaks = NULL) +
  scale_y_continuous(name = NULL, breaks = NULL) +
  labs(fill = "State") +
  scale_fill_manual(values=c("B"="blue", "R"="Red", "T"="orange"))
```{r}

```{r fig.width=10 fig.height = 15 }
# tweet count in B/R/T states
# B: Blue state | R: Red state | T: Tossup state
ggplot(data=bt, mapping=aes(x=reorder(state, tweet_cnt),y = tweet_cnt, fill=state))+geom_bar(stat='identity')+coord_flip()+geom_text(stat='identity',aes(label=tweet_cnt), vjust=1.6, color="Black", size=4.5)+scale_fill_manual(values=c("B"="blue", "R"="Red", "T"="orange"))+ggtitle('Number of tweet count in Blue/Red/Tossup state')+labs(x = NULL,y = 'Number of tweets')
```{r}

```{r}
p <- ggplot(data = bt, mapping = aes(x = 1, y = tweet_cnt, fill = state ))
p + geom_col(position = "stack") +
  scale_x_continuous(breaks = NULL, name = NULL) +
  labs(fill = "state", y = "Number of tweets") +
  scale_fill_manual(values=c("B"="blue", "R"="Red", "T"="orange"))
```{r}

```{r fig.width=10 fig.height = 15 }
# Mean polarity of tweets in B/R/T states
# B: Blue state | R: Red state | T: Tossup state
ggplot(data=bt, mapping=aes(x=reorder(state, BRT_avg_polarity),y = BRT_avg_polarity, fill=state))+geom_bar(stat='identity')+coord_flip()+geom_text(stat='identity',aes(label=BRT_avg_polarity), vjust=1.6, color="Black", size=4.5)+scale_fill_manual(values=c("B"="blue", "R"="Red", "T"="orange"))+ggtitle('Mean polarity of tweet in Blue/Red/Tossup state')+labs(x = NULL,y = 'Mean polarity of tweets')
```{r}
